title: Quantum Break (2016) [EN-MULTI] (2.5.0.0) (Repack by Samael) Upl
description:

Tablet: Is present (Disyer)

Description:
The game's plot revolves around a fictional North US University Riverport, where over time the experiment went very badly, and now for the main characters of the game - Jack Joyce (Shawn Ashmore), Beth Wilder (Courtney Hope), William Joyce (Dominic Monaghan) and Paul Sayrin (Aidan Gillen), opened up new possibilities. For example, Paul Sayrin has superpowers, which allows to see the different versions of events and alternative future, and Jack can stop time.

Features of release:
Do not cut / no recoded

Updated to 2.5.0.0

Automated activation

Exclusive installer by Samael

The game works only on computers running the operating system Windows 10 Professional and higher! (And some run Home)

A potential problem with the operating system, lock the owners of licensed copies of Windows
